name: Alien Odyssey Genesis
description:
Celine Chong, 2021

Empathy: ‘the ability to understand and share the feelings of another’; as easy as it may seem to understand its definition, the path to realize and comprehend its strong potential impacts can be hard and confusing. Often, the essence of it blooms most from being cornered as an outsider or the struggles of life itself. We face our struggles in every phase of our lives and it will appear itself in various forms. The ability to empathize allows us to reconnect, relate and be understanding, it gives us clarity and closure to the cause of a certain loss and struggle. Through such moments, we’d come to realize that in every loss, allows room for new gains. Everything happens for a reason, eventually every thing will fall in the right place.

Please visit www.pinktank.art for more information
